sentences.sContent: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.sCn: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.sContent: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.sCn: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.sContent: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.sCn: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.sContent: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.sCn: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.sContent: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.sCn: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.sContent: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.sCn: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.sContent: (= after that time ) we were the best of friends.
sentences.sCn: 从那以后我们就成了最好的朋友。
